description: Hero section with title, subtitle, description, CTA buttons and images

title.description: Main title displayed prominently (e.g., 'نساعدك في تأسيس و إدارة أعمالك')

subtitle.description: Subtitle below the main title (e.g., 'بسهولة وسرعة وأمان')

backgroundImage.description: Background image for the hero section

notes: This is a component that can be reused across multiple page types
Images should be optimized for web (WebP format recommended)
Ensure text has good contrast against the background image
Background image should be at least 1920x1080px
